Plot: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.
Title: Sideways
Writer: Rex Pickett (novel), Alexander Payne (screenplay), Jim Taylor (screenplay)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen, Sandra Oh
tomatoConsensus: Charming, thoughtful, and often funny, Sideways is a decidedly mature road trip comedy full of excellent performances.
